source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_00<tab>Sergeant Cracked Fist needs a hero to make a stew.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグのクラックド・フィスト闘曹長は、冒険者に兵士たちを鼓舞してほしいようだが……。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、キャンプ・ブルーフォグの「クラックド・フィスト闘曹長」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained enough basilisk meat. Take it to the cookfire just outside Camp Bluefog's northern gate, and add it to the bubbling cauldron.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_02<tab>料理の材料を入手した。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D5001 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E879101 /var>」を入れて、調理しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_03<tab>It will take a little while for the meat to be cooked through. Watch the cauldron until the stew is ready.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_03<tab>料理ができあがるまでしばらくかかる。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D5001 /var>」でしばらく待とう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_04<tab>Your keen instincts tell you that the basilisk stew is now ready. Scoop it from the bubbling cauldron.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_04<tab>料理ができあがったようだ。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D5001 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E879201 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_05<tab>You have three steaming bowls of basilisk stew expertly balanced in your hands. Make your way around Camp Bluefog and give them to the neediest soldiers.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_05<tab>できあがった料理を入手した。キャンプ・ブルーフォグを回って、兵士に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E879201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_06<tab>You have doled out all of the basilisk stew, which seems to have had the desired effect. Report your success to Sergeant Cracked Fist.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_06<tab>料理を配り終えた。キャンプ・ブルーフォグの「クラックド・フィスト闘曹長」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_07<tab>A jubilant Sergeant Cracked Fist thanks you for inspiriting his troops. They now remember their purpose, and stand ready to do their part in the impending phase of the operation.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_SEQ_07<tab>クラックド・フィスト闘曹長に報告した。冒険者のおかげで、兵達はいつもの力を取り戻したようだ。

target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_TODO_00本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
クラックド・フィスト闘曹長から再受注してください

target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_TODO_05本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
クラックド・フィスト闘曹長から再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_000<tab>I have a favor to ask of you, as a fellow comrade of the Alliance. As I mentioned, the garrison's mood is dark. The fault, it pains me to admit, is partly mine.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_000)) (( )) 03 /var>隊長。
さっそく、兵士たちに鼓舞を願いたいのですが……
その前に少々、語ってもよろしいですかな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_001<tab>I am no veteran of large-scale campaigns, you see, and the men and women under me are nervous for this knowledge.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_001ここまでの大規模作戦は、私にも経験がありません。
兵たちは皆、緊張と不安で気絶せんばかりであります。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_002<tab>Seeking to lift their spirits, I remembered the tale of a Gridanian general from a century past. Vainchelon was his name, and he was a lancer of great renown. History holds that, in spite of his rank, he would regularly cook meals for his troops while afield.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_002はるか1西紀前、グリダニアの名将「バンシュロン」は、
戦い慣れぬ兵たちに手ずから温かな飯を振る舞うことで、
彼らの怖れを解き、戦線を維持し続けたといいます。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_003<tab>Most generals know to break bread with their own men on occasion to foster camaraderie, but Vainchelon took it one step further. By actually <var 1A 02 /var>making<var 1A 01 /var> that bread, he showed that he was truly one of them─a hero <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> a comrade.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_003古きに学ぶことは、グリダニアの良き慣習でありましょう。
英雄である隊長が手がけた食事を口にすれば、
戦い慣れぬ我が兵たちも、ふるい立つに違いありません！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_004<tab>Though I wouldn't presume to compare myself to a man of his stature, I thought it might be well to at least emulate the deed. To be sure, this is a testament to my desperation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_004すでにベースはあちらの鍋に用意してあります。
あとは「」から、その肉を入手して少し煮込めば
「」の完成です。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_005<tab>I had begun making preparations for basilisk stew, all the while wondering whether it would be any good, when an honest-to-gods hero appeared. I speak of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, of course.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_005そして「」ができあがったら、
是非、兵たちに直接配っていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_006<tab>My gratitude would know no bounds if you could take up the ladle in my stead. The stew is just about ready─all it needs is some basilisk meat, which can be readily had north of here. Please procure the meat and add it to the cauldron bubbling just outside the camp.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_006英雄である隊長へのこの願い、非礼は重々承知しております。
お叱りならば、後ほどいかようにも受けましょう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_007<tab>When the stew is ready, I would ask that you also distribute it among our troops. Receiving the stew from you is certain to give them heart. I doubt I can say the same were it to come from my hands.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_007しかし……私は英雄であるあなたが、兵たちに
食事を配ることこそ、最も鼓舞に繋がると考えるのです。
なにとぞ、よろしくお願いいたします！
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_TODO_000_030<tab>鍋のBGにアクションして<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E879201 /var>ゲット

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ZEZERAGI_000_010<tab>Brrr... It's always so dark here...and <var 1A 02 /var>cold<var 1A 01 /var>... Maybe I shouldn't have enlisted... It's not like killing Garleans will bring my friend back...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ZEZERAGI_000_010うう……いやだよぅ、帰りたいよぅ……
こんな冷たくて怖い場所で、
誰にも看取られずに死にたくなんかないよぅ……

source:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ZEZERAGI_000_020Mmmmmm, this smells good...
Aren't you the adventurer who triumphed at Cape Westwind? To think that a hero fights beside us! And this stew, it whets my appetite for vengeance! Just you wait, you Garlean whoresons! I'm coming for your heads! Muahahaha!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ZEZERAGI_000_020うう、このシチュー……すごく、温かいです。
英雄であるの、温かさが伝わってくるみたいだ。
それがし、のためなら、頑張れる気がしてきました！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ADELENA_000_030<tab>Gods, this is all so hopeless! The Garleans are going to crush us with their steel monstrosities! We're all going to die! <sob>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ADELENA_000_030帝国軍と戦って、勝てるわけがないわ……
だって、あの黒い金属兵器……
こんな武器で勝てるわけがない！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ADELENA_000_040<tab>I'm...I'm so sorry. I don't know what came over me. Your words and this hearty stew have given me courage. Yes, a fire positively <var 1A 02 /var>burns<var 1A 01 /var> in my belly! ...Or is it just the basilisk venom?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_ADELENA_000_040……あなたの強さと優しさが、心にまで染み入るようです。
ありがとうございます、英雄)) (( )) 03 /var>。
私、やれるだけやってみますね！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_BETYN_000_050<tab>I-I think I'll pretend to be sick. That way I won't have to fight. Maybe they'll even send me home to my family. It's not as if one man would make a difference, right?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_BETYN_000_050ぶるぶるぶる……
傷病兵のフリしてれば、戦わなくていいよな？
みんながいるし、俺1人戦わなくても勝てるよな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_BETYN_000_060<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> made this stew...for <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? I...I never dreamed that I would share a meal with a hero, let alone partake of something <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> <var 1A 02 /var>made<var 1A 01 /var>. I wanted to be a hero, too, you know─to my family. I took up arms because I wanted to protect them...and I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var>! I won't run─not today, nor any other!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_BETYN_000_060英雄様が手ずから飯を……？
クソ、ビビってた自分が情けねえや！
俺も戦う！　あんたのように、最後まで戦ってやるぜ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_070<tab>Your basilisk stew has done wonders for our troops' morale! I cannot thank you enough!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_070ありがとうございます！
兵たちの心に、あなたの心が届いたようです！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_071<tab>The seeming hopelessness of the situation─not to mention this accursed gloom─had dampened their spirits, and for a time they had forgotten their purpose. But your presence and culinary skills helped them to remember, and I'm confident they will do their part to protect the realm and their loved ones.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC904_01039_CRACKEDFIST_000_071きっと彼らは常の力を取り戻し、
自らの意思で自らの大地を守るために戦うでしょう。
それは畢竟、あなたの力になると私は信じております。
